channel.title: Garden Heroes

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Open Homes
channel.desc: Mike shows you how to renovate a beachside home with all the bells and whistles. Plus we visit a multi-million dollar award winning home in Byron Bay.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Flat Out Fabulous
channel.desc: Megan, Jen and Fran are our Geordie trio that have bonded over their love of animals. Fellow animal lover Whinnie wants to give it a 50's retro pet palace revamp.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Virtually Home
channel.desc: People with interior design dilemmas are offered a helping hand by some of the UKs top interior designers, alongside the use of some cutting-edge virtual reality technology.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: A Place in the Sun: Summer Sun
channel.desc: House hunters are taken to see properties for sale in a foreign country that they want to move to or frequently holiday in.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Real Health
channel.desc: Real Health is a lifestyle show featuring holistic health solutions in an easy to absorb and palatable manner.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Home Rescue
channel.desc: R?is?n and the Desperate Houses crew spend three days with Annette from Tallaght, helping her rescue two hopelessly cluttered bedrooms.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Flat Out Fabulous
channel.desc: Megan, Jen and Fran are our Geordie trio that have bonded over their love of animals. Fellow animal lover Whinnie wants to give it a 50's retro pet palace revamp.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Art Of Architecture
channel.desc: Sir David Chipperfield restores the iconic Neue National Galerie in Berlin in honour of the original architect, Ludig Mies van der Rohe.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Finest Homes
channel.desc: Finest Homes explores modern masterpieces and character-filled design, talking to the visionaries who are bringing them to life, as well as the people who live in them.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Garden Heroes
channel.desc: The Garden Heroes experts are visiting 3 gardens under the theme of 'Grow Your Own Way'.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Virtually Home
channel.desc: People with interior design dilemmas are offered a helping hand by some of the UKs top interior designers, alongside the use of some cutting-edge virtual reality technology.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: AfriMaxx
channel.desc: Afrimaxx is a lifestyle show which searches for inspiration and innovation in all areas of popular culture - from fashion and design through to architecture, art, food and travel.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Open Homes
channel.desc: Mike shows you how to renovate a beachside home with all the bells and whistles. Plus we visit a multi-million dollar award winning home in Byron Bay.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Nadiya Bakes
channel.desc: Nadiya believes you can create something delicious without breaking the bank, so her rosti quiche, fluffy onion pretzels rhubarb and custard kisses are baked on a budget.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Jamie's Quick & Easy Food
channel.desc: Jamie's Quick & Easy Food is the ultimate set of go-to recipes that are quick to cook and easy to remember.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Donal Skehan: Home Cook
channel.desc: Donal shares recipes to suit every kind of busy household, with new, easy-to-follow recipes, time-saving hacks and practical cooking tips, including the kitchen gadgets that Donal relies on at home.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Grand Designs UK
channel.desc: Grand Designs UK, hosted by designer and writer Kevin McCloud, follows intrepid homebuilders as they pursue their architectural dreams.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Gardening 101 With Melanie Walker
channel.desc: Melanie visits a wholesale plant grower that specializes in bedding plants. Linda Galvad gives you the 101 to starting an organic veggie garden.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Scott's Vacation House Rules
channel.desc: In every episode Scott McGillivray helps make homeowner's dreams come true by unlocking the hidden potential in their dated, uninspired vacation property.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Eyes for the Job
channel.desc: Chris Judge and Rebekah Higgs give tips for home improvement and accessibility tips.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Art Of Architecture
channel.desc: Sir David Chipperfield restores the iconic Neue National Galerie in Berlin in honour of the original architect, Ludig Mies van der Rohe.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Finest Homes
channel.desc: Finest Homes explores modern masterpieces and character-filled design, talking to the visionaries who are bringing them to life, as well as the people who live in them.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Garden Heroes
channel.desc: The Garden Heroes experts are visiting 3 gardens under the theme of 'Grow Your Own Way'.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Property Brothers: Forever Home
channel.desc: Josefina's LA home is the heart of her Chilean family. The cramped, disjointed flow, and uneven floors on the main level make it hard for Josefina and her family to move around.
